So I put up even more money and ordered the same boots for the same seller paying for express shipping and wow 2 days later they arrived. So if you want items from this site select the most expensive way to purchase that item or you will be screwed with and cheated till you finally repurchase the item at the higher price.

And they don't do returns or refunds. They say they have a guarantee if your purchase isn't authentic. But if they "verified" it before they sent it to me, how exactly does that work?! I wish I had read their reviews before I purchased from them. I would have NEVER purchased ANYTHING from a company that has a 2.2 star rating! I still haven't received a refund or the shoes and was basically told they wont be coming at all and since i dont have the apple id email in the format requested i wont get a refund. To make matters worse i was emailed a 15% off discount code that expires in 90 days as if id ever purchase from this site again. If anyone is reading this do not order here. When the seller fails to send the item they in turn will lie and tell you its delayed, they refuse to give any customer service number for those that aren't tech savvy, and have zero customer loyalty. Review.Titre: Both buyers and sellers beware
Review.Contenu: Watch purchased for my son for Christmas.  Someone’s £2,500 hand bag delivered instead (no tags attached so despite on here multiple comments that they have vigorous verification processes that hadn’t happened) contacted stockx straight away.  Bag delivered back I’ve had 3 weeks of back and forward emails, multiple requests of confirmation that the bag was sent back.  Emails to me saying they have it but was waiting for verification (to be clear they had no idea what bag it was and that they ever sent it).  Then more emails as it was clear they had then lost the bag and were waiting for me to return the watch I never received.  They’ve requested my drivers licence details to open an investigation.  In the end I started a credit card claim against them and my bank advised no personal information be sent.  Finally today I received my refund it’s taken 4 weeks of constant emails.I’ve had along the way refund will be processed immediately after bag received back then 1-5 days, 3-5 days and 5-8 days.  No department knows what the other is doing.  My watch and this bag have clearly been lost along the way (to be clear the watch was no where near £2,500) so the suggestion I was somehow making up receiving it is just ludicrous.  I’ve been offered $40 goodwill gesture to re order the watch no thanks watch ordered via eBay and received 2 days later and is genuine with receipt etc.Would I ever use stockx again absolutely not would I recommend sellers using stockx absolutely not given I received someone’s bag they had sent in for verification.  Their verification team are non existent and I think their customer care team is just as bad.

I have since been sent an update simply saying that my order is delayed and will be sent in 1-2 weeks, which is totally useless to me and disappointing. It will be approaching a month by the time the item is even potentially shipped.Not to mention the inflated price I bought the item at on the original date which had reduced by £50 by the time the seller actually shipped the item 5 days later- no offer for partial refund to reflect current stock prices!!In response to StockX reply below- again you’re missing the point. My issue now lies solely with StockX who for some reason still have the item for verification/authentication after 6 days and show no sign of shipping it to me any time soon. What is the delay now please??

Review.Titre: Never shopping at Stockx
Review.Contenu: Well, fasten your seatbelts because this might be a long one. Let's start with ordering the Air Jordan 11s platinum tints. Ordering was easy and simple, I like how they have a layout of when the order is placed, then recieved, then shipped etc.. Each step lights up when it gets to that step. That's all cool until my order was delayed for maybe a day or two since the original seller wasn't available anymore and now a new one needed to accommodate my order. Not a big deal, the whole purpose of this review is the fact these pairs of 11 platinum tints has a serious cosmetic issue, at least in my eyes, when it comes to the glue that is holding the shoe and white sole together, on one of the shoes it literally looks like It was put together by someone unprofessionally and given to me.. This will be the first and only review I ever write and make for you guys Stockx, not only because I don't even write reviews like that, but also because I will NEVER shop at stockx again, due to the fact you guys CANNOT be trusted, at least with my money, anymore since I am terrified of ever receiving another pair from you guys. Imagine how I feel having these pairs with this issue, wanting to now try to trade or swap the pair with a normal looking pair so I can feel comfortable wearing these. I have a video and photos to prove it. I'm also writing this for other buyers like myself that gets excited to buy a pair of awesome sneakers only to recieve a pair with a ugly cosmetic issue, when it's suppose to be factory brand new. I will now buy all my sneakers at goat from now on until they also give me a reason to stop shopping there. I just bought some 13s and the 11 gratitudes from goat so let's see how they turn out.

Then realized it was cancelled and had to pay more in order to get the sneakers I had already “buy now” bought, for more money and days later than I had hoped.After “buy now” for a second time my shoes did go through the stockx process and were shipped to me. Review.Titre: When the customer is assumed to be a criminal...
Review.Contenu: This experience was both elating and disappointing on a variety of levels. First, StockX as a sneaker exchange was the best marketplace I was able to find for a limited edition pair of sneakers that I was willing to overpay for due to scarcity. The pluses are they are big on product authentication and the personal touch of their customer support is solid. Unfortunately their customer service policies are a disaster. My package arrived damaged and the administrative burden associated with transacting a remedy were more challenging than applying for a credit card, paying court costs, or just about any other social transaction. #1 I am not a sneaker dealer, just an end user. StockX does not need a driver's license to issue a refund for shipping. No other entity does this and I repeat that I was not looking to return the entire shipment. My ability to resell the product is already compromised. Just comp me the shipping and call it a day. #2 They make you fill out a waiver as a PDF. Nobody wants to deal with PDFs unless you are dealing with a government agency and have no choice in the matter. #3 This company does business from a Michigan address. If the State of Michigan or Wayne County is indirectly imposing this administrative burden on customers then  I recommend StockX move to Wisconsin which is way nicer for mail order businesses. Thank you. I will go back to eBay.

Review.Contenu: Just wished you could return or cancel an order. I would purchase more often.

Review.Titre: There are pros and cons
Review.Contenu: Online showed or implied mdse was in stock.  I ordered 3 pairs of shoes for my grandkids.  1 came in a few days.  Another came a few days later.  It's been WELL over a week and I still have not received the third pair.  I'm not even certain when they will get it in stock and ship it.BTW, my wife tells me that they don't take returns.  If the shoes have obviously NOT been taken out of the box,  I think that's a bit unreasonable.  I accidentally ordered two pairs of the same shoes and now must sell one on ebay or something else.   If my wife's information is true, deduct one star.  If it's not true, then the two star review applies.  I will probably not be ordering from them again.  I did this time because that's what I was instructed to do by my wife and she knows more about this than I do...or was supposed to. So I guess I'd say if you're in a hurry to get 3 day delivery, explore options.  If you're not absolutely sure of what you want, order from someone who takes returns.  BUT, it's my understanding that they have possibly the best stock available.

Review.Titre: My sneakers came WREAKING of cigarette…
Review.Contenu: My sneakers came WREAKING of cigarette smoke. No idea how I’m going to get this smell out of them. Might return. How could you consciously ship these to me??? They stink up my entire house!

Review.Titre: Packaging was disappointing!
Review.Contenu: The item description said the item was new however the item box looked used with obvious opening. In addition the box was damaged looking like it had been crushed. I would be embarrassed to give this as a gift to someone other than my son as the package looked old/used. It made me question if all pieces were there. Hopefully when my son puts it together nothing will be missing.

Review.Titre: Took too long and was told I would be refunded
Review.Contenu: Ordered a pair of Dunks and it originally took around 2 weeks and requested information about my order. I got a pretty quick response saying that the seller did not pass the verification check and they got a new seller and that one did not pass either so they had started a refund for me. I needed the pair of dunks fairly quick for an event so I purchased them from a different website and received them. Then randomly one morning I got a notification saying the shoes had shipped and finally received them 20+ days later. Now I have two pairs of the same shoes and didn’t get a refund.

Review.Titre: I gave it a 2 star because it took 12…
Review.Contenu: I gave it a 2 star because it took 12 or more days to arrive. That wild because it's normally 3-5 business days. Goat took 7 days which isn't bad, but 12 days?!!! 12 days!!! My shoe went outta style by the time it arrived. Shhheessshhh!!!

Review.Titre: Unsatisfied customer
Review.Contenu: The pair of shoes we purchased seemed to have some damage to the toe area. I tried to put in a request to speak to customer service I went through all the jumps, hoops and hurdles. They requested by taking all the pictures and documentation uploaded them and then I was denied because it said something went wrong on the page. I tried to email them through the link provided and again I was denied because something went wrong on the page. Needless to say, I never had a chance to speak to anybody about my concerns I was passed the 10 day allotted window, and now we have a pair of shoes were unhappy with, customer service is horrendous. It is not easy to find what you’re looking for in the health section. I’m frustrated there’s nobody to talk to or a phone number to contact anyone would not recommend purchasing through them again.

Review.Titre: Not being able to cancel an order…
Review.Contenu: Not being able to cancel an order within minutes. I accidentally ordered the same shoe twice. I didn’t have the extra $215 to give away now I have to figure something out.

Review.Titre: Sucks having to buy a 2nd pair of shoes…
Review.Contenu: Sucks having to buy a 2nd pair of shoes on credit they gave me, all because my initial pair was completely defective.  Not even close to new like I expected.  Paying extra funds to ship them back?! Really?!

Review.Contenu: Seller never replied to my bid but I received a charge on my card. Makes me question the security of the site.

Review.Titre: Shipping takes absolutely Forever
Review.Contenu: Shipping takes absolutely Forever, the Shoes came damaged & somehow were not Cancelled & returned back to Seller, Taxes are too High, NEVER Recommend StockX to anyone unless its something you certainly cannot buy out of StockX. Have purchased 3 items from StockX in the past & never been Satisfied.

Looked at the website and clearly says no returns or refunds. A little disappointed being that these crocs cost me nearly $100. Don't think I'd ordered from this sire again.

Review.Titre: Paying 20$ for shipping on a hoodie is…
Review.Contenu: Paying 20$ for shipping on a hoodie is fine. That it’s not shipped in a box to protect it doesn’t make sense. You shipped in a bag which increases the odds of damage.  If you are charging that much you send in better packaging

Review.Titre: Christmas presents not going to be on time
Review.Contenu: Well, my sons shoes were supposed to be here already. Now I get told they had to find another seller and they won’t be here till after Christmas. I am devastated.

Review.Titre: Fast delivery but no help from customer service.
Review.Contenu: The product was shipped/delivered quickly and with good communication. However, there was an error on the site when I ordered the shoes and I accidentally ordered two pairs. (First time the app didn’t show me a confirmation; it brought me right back to the product screen.) I contacted them and was told that I was out of luck and that there was no chance of canceling one pair. (Orders were placed less than a minute apart) This was to “preserve the integrity “ of their bid systems. I did buy both pairs at full asking price, for what it’s worth. The lack of any willingness to help turned me off. I will buy elsewhere when I am need. At least my daughter will have a backup pair, I guess.

Review.Titre: Overpriced handling fee

Review.Titre: bad experience

And the worst part is that after all of the issues and time it took for my package to get here, I can’t even return or exchange it bc it’s too big (I should have checked the return policy first) Unfortunately I won’t be ordering from stockX again.

Again how they passed these is worrying...,even Stevie Wonder could of seen this!!! Then trying to get hold of Stock X was a mission in itself. All this AI chat BS sending you around in circles when you just need to speak to a human being was painful again. Avoid Stock X like the plague.

Review.Titre: It just took way too long to receive my order.

Review.Titre: I have made many purchases on Stock X
Review.Contenu: I have made many purchases on Stock X. Every shoe arrived in great condition. I ordered the "Korn" Adidas shoes advertised as New/Unworn. Upon opening the box the tissue paper was horribly crumbled and the interior of the shoes appear to have "sock fuzz" in them. Very easy to notice as the interior of the shoes are white. I understand that Stock X is verifying the shoes as authentic, but in my opinion should also be looking at these details. These would not qualify as "New" to a person who collects shoes.

Review.Titre: Delivery date got rescheduled many…
Review.Contenu: Delivery date got rescheduled many times, the seller needs to improve on shipping the item faster.

Review.Titre: disappointment t
Review.Contenu: I don’t like the app. I prefer to to speak to a real person, when I have a concern. Had a an issue with an order an it wasn’t resolved, I feel. So, I won’t be using the app Again

Review.Titre: Skeptical and disappointed
Review.Contenu: The country of origin  the shoes originate from how the verification is done and is a bit hidden.  The shoes promise to ship to the verification within a few days minus holidays and weekends, which took mine about a week and a half to even get verified and shipped… When I noticed it was coming from Hong Kong I was a little discouraged because I had never used this company before.  There are no phone numbers to talk to anyone. you have to wait till somebody send you an email to address your questions.  When I finally received the shoes, I inspected them, and was concerned because it looked like they had been worn, and that somebody tried to clean up the soles, but missed a few spots.  I’m upset because it said new never worn  and paid over $168 for the shoes and it is clear that they’ve been worn and cleaned.  If whoever was verifying, went over these shoes, a little slower, I believe they would’ve noticed that this has been worn or, they could advertise “shoe is new with minor imperfections from handling and trying on” I just feel all around that I was misled and I took a big leap of faith and spending this money on a pair of shoes that my son wants.  I am not satisfied with how this went down and I’m hoping to get some sort of refund… but as I waited so long to receive these shoes by the time that they could be replaced it’s going to be past Christmas… so definitely upset.

Review.Titre: Usually good

Review.Titre: I reached out to costumer service right…
Review.Contenu: I reached out to costumer service right away when i realized i had accidentally chose the wrong size. I tried to cancel the order or at least get them to send me my right size and now im stuck with shoes that don’t fit.

Review.Titre: StockX greed
Review.Contenu: The bid was placed a while ago and the sneakers were purchased on November 1. Then I receive an email the seller backed out but do not worry we found another seller. However, the date sold magically changes to November 13 in StockX app. Which is obviously a lie. After the first buyer didn’t work out I should’ve been asked if I was still interested OR I should’ve been compensated. StockX once charged me a $75 cancellation fee as the seller because I shipped the sneakers 1 day late. Give me $25 back from that. The company keeps raising its fees and changing their rules. As a seller I’m held to a high standard… how come StockX isn’t held to a high standard when I’m the buyer?

Review.Titre: Terrible Service
Review.Contenu: Order was supposed to come way earlier than expressed & then my “matched seller” had to be switched to a new seller then i finally got a hold of someone on the chat help center and they didn’t even help me in the slightest.. the whole thing was sketchy and annoying

Review.Titre: seem OK

Review.Titre: When I received my shoes

Review.Titre: Shoes are for my son
Review.Contenu: Shoes are for my son, Santa’s gift, and they smelled like cigarettes. The person who sold them either smoked in their home or something because the shoes were penetrated in cigarette smell, which now I am stuck trying to remove the smell before Christmas.

Review.Titre: FIRST TIME USER…MY EXPERIENCE WAS JUST ‘MEH’
Review.Contenu: Only 3 stars because of a few reasons. - Price (More expensive than any place else)- Shipping took a long time- Availability was good the week AFTER I ordered. So many places had these in stock after I ordered and I almost cancelled multiple times. Box was in great shape and I do not doubt the authenticity of the sneakers.

Review.Titre: The shipping was very timely
Review.Contenu: The shipping was very timely. However, their policy won’t allow for returns. This is definitely very inconvenient if you happen to have an issue with the size or damaged merchandise.

Review.Titre: Shipping Time + Customer Support
Review.Contenu: I disliked the ridiculous wait time. I literally waited a month. Regardless of what the standard shipping option said, StockX did NOT uphold their end of the Standard shipping deal. Along with that particular problem that upset me, there was a miniscule reach out to me about the processes of my order. I say it was miniscule because the emails I would receive seemed automated. I felt that there was no real care about my order from a REAL HUMAN. StockX is now at the bottom of my least for a platform to purchase sneakers/clothes. I listened to past customers about the wait time problem and I thought y'all would've corrected it by now. Guess not. Glad my item is Authentic, that's why the 3stars. Doubt I'll come back to the platform for a purchase, probably just be on the App to check prices now.

Review.Titre: After my order had been received by…
Review.Contenu: After my order had been received by stockx but not shipped - for several days I might add - I needed to change the recipient’s address. If it was possible, I was unable to decipher how on the website. In today’s digital world this should be a simple process, but clearly it is not here.

Review.Titre: Lots of fees for this service
Review.Contenu: Lots of fees for this service. Have many items cancel on me. I understand it’s an inconvenience for us both but it’s just really annoying.

Review.Titre: I like the prices
Review.Contenu: I like the prices although the delivery time is a little long. What I do not like is waiting for an item I ordered for 10 days and then the order is cancelled and refund issued. Sometimes it is hard as the order is for a birthday or Christmas and there is no chance to replace.

Review.Titre: Upfront
Review.Contenu: We were in a rush to find these shoes for my daughter’s Christmas. The initial grab from Stock x was that shoes were $151 and would arrive by Dec 25. After the dust settled, the shoes were $191 and there was a possibility that they could arrive by January 2.All is well though! The shoes made it- though they cost more than anticipated.

Review.Titre: I have ordered the same shoe twice…
Review.Contenu: I have ordered the same shoe twice (11/28/23, 12/6/23,12/13/23) .  Today the second order was cancelled and referred to another seller and cancelled again, so I ordered a 3rd time.  It almost seems like a way to get more and more money from the customer. I know the problems may come from the seller and not StockX, but if you are paying a premium price for a product, StockX should stand behind the sale or stop dealing with those sellers that renege on the sale.  I hope the 3rd times the charm.  There will be NO more.

Review.Titre: Red mark in white shoe
Review.Contenu: The process was quick and the shoe is comfortable. My only qualm was that when the order arrived, there is a red scuff on the tongue of my left shoe that’s quite noticeable. For paying as much as I did, this is unacceptable in my mind.

Review.Titre: Did took too long
Review.Contenu: Did not deliver when first said the shoes I ordered would be here. The date of delivery kept getting moved forward.  Finally delivered yesterday. Don’t like waiting and wondering.

Review.Titre: Satisfactory Experience
Review.Contenu: I liked the Fact that you had the shoe I wanted but once I made the purchase I didn't know when the shoe would come or if it was coming. I actually gave up because I thought I was being scammed.   but the shoe finally arrive and was in pristine condition.

Review.Titre: The process was pretty straightforward
Review.Contenu: The process was pretty straightforward, but the issue is that I ordered a pair of shoes and got confirmation that everything we good and then it got cancelled on me. The issue is that when I had to get the shoes again I had to pay $10 more than o paid the first time. Frustrating that something out of my control made me pay more for some shoes that are already pretty expensive.

Review.Titre: Be cautious and ask lots of questions.
Review.Contenu: I like that I can find items hard to find anywhere else, but the process takes forever, I placed my order in October and just received my package and although the product states it’s new in box, the box is in poor shape and the sneakers smell like cigarette smoke.  Very disappointing..

Review.Titre: Fast shipment from selller to stock x…
Review.Contenu: Fast shipment from selller to stock x and fast shipment from stock x to me but the shipping box was atrocious and barely taped closed .

Review.Titre: My package was delivered to the wrong…
Review.Contenu: My package was delivered to the wrong address, I’m not really sure why but luckily I had a neighbour who picked it up from the front stairs of my building.I had a different address set as my shipping address but instead the package came to the address on my banking information.Porch pirates are active in my area this time of year but thankfully they didn’t get my shoes.

Review.Titre: I know during the holidays things can…
Review.Contenu: I know during the holidays things can get hectic and this review has nothing to do with the shoes themselves but with Fed Ex. The shoes were delivered on a Thursday, but they weren’t. Fed Ex sent a text notifying me of the delivery and signed by an individual I never heard of and does not live in my building. Waited a few days to file a claim with Stock X and lo and behold they show up 5 days later. No picture was taken and left outside by the Fed Ex driver when it would have been so easy to call me or someone else in my building by use of our phone system outside of the building. Packages are being stolen left and right. An unnecessary liability for $200.00 shoes if they would have just called. No idea where the shoes were for 5 days.

Review.Titre: first order with StockX
Review.Contenu: I was very impressed at the quickness of the order process.  The only thing I was upset about is that I was charged a different price than the receipt that came with the order.

Review.Titre: it was okay. not great, not the worst.
Review.Contenu: it was ok. shipping and delivery got delayed and i was not updated about the status of my order. It took about 10-12 days to get a notification on where my shoes were. Once i reached out, i was then notified and my shoes were back on track. they look good. hopefully they will be the perfect gift.

Review.Titre: Well to start with the positive I did…
Review.Contenu: Well to start with the positive I did end up getting the product I wanted. The negative is the first time I purchased and was matched the product never made it to stock x and it took weeks to get a refund then had to do the process over so that’s frustrating.

Review.Titre: my experience
Review.Contenu: I ordered the reebok question mid denver nuggets, great shoes, new and verified.Delivery time is good, it depends on different factors, I was lucky that my ordere has been shipped in 13 days (Italy).nonetheless there are something that left me like :/.the shoes' box seem soo old and gave the impression that the shoes was used, it's not new, so not a great impression at first sight.(I didn't receive stockx sticker, but not big deal).overall I suggest stockx!!

Review.Titre: Things that make you go hmm…
Review.Contenu: In review of my first purchase I have a concern with the authenticity of the shoe. However, Second purchase was great. Perhaps I should have looked at the first pair before making another purchase. Not sure if I’ll be using StockX in the future.

The cardboard was completely ruined and I had to discard the box and put them in an old shoe box for Christmas.  Thankfully these will be worn and not collected; otherwise they would have been returned.

Review.Titre: First Impressions…
Review.Contenu: Ordered twice because first pair never arrived. I had to contact stock x to get updated. Second try, Shoe box was damaged, paper inside was damaged and little teal bag that comes with the shoes is missing. Not superior service! Not packaged well so that the box is not damaged in transit.

Review.Titre: Box has more damage than expected
Review.Contenu: Box has more damage than expected. Shoes have scuff marks and aren’t in mint condition for the price I paid.

Review.Titre: Excessive charges
Review.Contenu: The product was available and arrived in a timely manner in spite of the extra authentication steps in the process and I sincerely appreciate that. However, the additional charges for taxes, shipping and “platform” fees added almost $100 to a pair of sneakers that already cost $315, is excessive and screams price gouging for the average consumer. While I do appreciate how well the process worked, thinking of all the kids whose parents cannot afford to even look at your website has made me question future purchases. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Almost there

Review.Contenu: Shoes have delayed twice for shipping. It shouldn't take almost a month to receive an item or product that you purchased.

Review.Contenu: The shoes that came were attractive, but a size too small. The return policy is -- no returns; you have to relist the item. And StockX takes a cut coming and going: so, to break even, you have to relist at a price that no one is willing to pay. StockX gives themselves time to authenticate shoes, I wish customers had time to discover if they even fit.

Review.Contenu: I am concerned that the picture on Stock X does not match the shoe I saw in the store. The difference is subtle but very concerned that these are a Christmas gift for my daughter and she will be able to spot a fake immediately

Review.Titre: Shoes dope but one of the hardwear…
Review.Contenu: Shoes dope but one of the hardwear pieces was missing. The brass shoe lace hole at the top. Disappointing considering they were almost $300 shoes.

Review.Titre: Just wow😹
Review.Contenu: Can’t complain, but I liked the prices way more before all the ridiculous taxes were included! I payed almost $40 for taxes!

Review.Titre: Was bummed when I opened it box was…
Review.Contenu: Was bummed when I opened it box was crunched and the shows have a few marks on them so not new condition as stated

Review.Titre: First order had shipping issue
Review.Contenu: First order had shipping issue.  Order was refunded and I had to reorder.  By this time the cost had increased $30.

Review.Titre: Quality control sucks
Review.Contenu: QC sucks you let deadstock shoes with scuffs on them pass. You should also give buyers the option to cancel orders if the first seller didn’t pass verification.

Review.Titre: Right shoes, not great delivery timing
Review.Contenu: Thought the website payment section was confusing and got an unexpected email from someone asking for payment when I had already paid. Took a long time to actually get the shoes ordered. Not my fave shopping spot.

Review.Titre: I don't find the website the easiest to…
Review.Contenu: I don't find the website the easiest to use.  The bidding process is confusing.  In my opinion, if you want something, you have to do the Buy it Now option.  Also, it is concerning to me how many items are coming from China.  Hopefully, they are being authenticated here in the US.  I have bought here a few times, but still feel some concern every time.

Review.Titre: The shoe box is kind of dented
Review.Contenu: The shoe box is kind of dented not kind of happy but otherwise it’s all good

Review.Titre: Could have been packaged nicer
Review.Contenu: Shoes came in great condition, but the box was torn and beat up, plus the paper around the shoes in box was dirty and torn as well.

Review.Titre: Too much spam, little info on eta
Review.Contenu: Received little information about shipping and estimated time of arrival and way too many spam emails

Review.Titre: Order was fine
Review.Contenu: Order was fine! They don’t provide a tracking link for FedEx. My package was delivered to the wrong address and I couldn’t see any photo proof of delivery. Luckily my neighbor returned it

Review.Titre: i received one of my recent orders missing
Review.Contenu: i received one of my recent orders missing the dust bag which is supposed to a company the product, i should have been informed prior to shipping the product, nonetheless your service is spectacular.

Review.Titre: Customer Service at StockX was great…
Review.Contenu: Customer Service at StockX was great and quick to respond to my question on an order update.  I am new to this process and am disappointed to learn that a seller can immediately receive payment from me but then be unable to fulfill the order.  I waited days (Bid accepted on Nov 30 and I made contact on Dec 6) for an update that the item was shipped only to find out the seller could not fulfill the order after I asked.  I have a refund in process and appreciate the staff of StockX.  But, I hope the seller has some ramification for posting, accepting, and then being unable to complete the transaction.  I can't back out after they accept the bid.  Seems shady that they can.

Review.Titre: Long wait
Review.Contenu: The shoes are great.  However it took forever to arrive.  The original seller never sent the shoe in for authentication and stock x had to match me up with a new seller, this caused me to not have a gift for someone on their exact birthday which is a shame because It was ordered a month in advance.

Review.Titre: Shoe apparently "passed" QC
Review.Contenu: Shoe apparently "passed" QC, but when I received the shoes, there was as clear scuff mark on the side. I've reached out to support, and TBD on the end result...very frustrating nonetheless.**UPDATE**StockX customer service replied and was understanding and apologetic about the error. They offered me the ability to return the shoes for a full refund or provide me with a $30 site credit. Customer service handled the situation appropriately, but this should not have happened in the first place. StockX should consider allowing sellers to post pictures of the EXACT shoe for sale in the seller stock instead of a stock photo.

Review.Titre: Shoes arrived smelling like cigarette…
Review.Contenu: Shoes arrived smelling like cigarette smoke. Service was good, but a bummer to pay good money for smelly shoes

Review.Titre: The shoebox came badly damaged and the…
Review.Contenu: The shoebox came badly damaged and the right shoe itself is also badly shaped - For the price charged I could’ve just bought them without the box or another site.

Review.Titre: The threading on the shoes were all…
Review.Contenu: The threading on the shoes were all coming undone. Terrible quality.

Review.Titre: Seller’s shoes were not approved
Review.Contenu: Seller’s shoes were not approved, no fault of StockX and appreciate the legit check and the price match with a new seller, but overall process took too long. Maybe overnight replacements after failed first transactions. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Quick shipping
Review.Contenu: Quick shipping. Great product, but the return policy is length. My shoes were too small and I had to send like 5 pictures. Now under review.  Haven’t heard yet.

Review.Titre: Order Issue
Review.Contenu: I placed an order on 11/20 and haven’t received it yet. The item hasn’t been sent to StockX yet. Granted seller is still within window to send to StockX, but pushing the 7-10 days with last week’s holiday. Placed an order on 11/23 and already received. Just concerned I will look at alternatives if seller doesn’t deliver and reordering something to arrive in time for the holiday.

Review.Titre: Cancelling order
Review.Contenu: I emailed telling them that I needed to cancel my order because it was going to arrive too late, was told that since it “was still processing” that I couldn’t cancel? I hadn’t been charged so I didn’t see the issue. Found a different seller and was able to get the shoes earlier SO now I’ve got two pairs of the same shoe. Hence why I had requested to cancel it. I’ve never had any issues with the company in the past.

Review.Titre: good but...
Review.Contenu: Glad to get my hands on shoes that are hard to find. But I dislike that immediately after a purchase while it's pending there is no room to tweak the order.

Review.Titre: Box arrived pretty severely damaged…
Review.Contenu: Interior shoe box arrived pretty severely damaged which is not helpful to a collector. Kind of disappointing. I understand that they inspect the shoes when sent in, but you should not be sending things to collectors with terribly damaged boxes. It completely devalues the item and makes them impossible to resell down the road. This should be treated just like the shoes and returned to the seller when they show up for inspection in a ruined box.

Review.Titre: Not the best first impression.
Review.Contenu: So this was my first StockX order. This purchase was for a pre order, Jordan 3 Fear 2023. The order was processed and received relatively fast compared to what I expected. The shoes arrived fine but they seemed a bit disheveled. I feel that the person who did the authentication was a bit careless. Laces were not tidy, an insole on one of the shoes wasn't in straight, the box paper was ripped and the authentication tag was loose in the box. Not a good representation or motivation of a future order. There was a processing fee as well and I don't recall every paying a verification fee elsewhere. Overall not a great first impression.

Review.Titre: not satisfied
Review.Contenu: overall the return process went well, but I have yet to get an update in regards to the outcome. I replied to the email I was in contact with Isabella that I would like to get the pair of shoes that I originally ordered but she has yet to respod. I guess I'll have to open up a new ticket to resolve the issue. so overall all I'm not happy with the end result.

Review.Titre: Damaged box
Review.Contenu: When the expensive pair of shoes arrived the box it was shipped in was damaged as well as the box the shoes were in.  For the amount of money spent, the box should have been intact.

Review.Titre: Good product, slow shipping
Review.Contenu: I ordered a really popular shoe and the shipping took forever like over 3 weeks. You guys just need to do a pre-verification on popular shoes so you can ship them right to customer like GOAT does. Other than that everything was fine my shoes were straight packaging good and everything neat and tidy quality was there just slow ass shipping. All that being said though I will use stockx again

Review.Titre: Usually my experience with Stock X is…
Review.Contenu: Usually my experience with Stock X is good this last time wasn’t I placed a order it was confirmed but seller didn’t hold up there end it’s been 6 days and they have not sent out the shoe which I purchased for someone as a Christmas gift now I’m sure they won’t receive it on time.

Review.Titre: I was originally paying for a lower…
Review.Contenu: I was originally paying for a lower price for the same shoes. But ended up getting a refund for it a few days later. I went back to check if the shoes were unavailable or not. The shoes in the exact size I was looking at before was still up but for a higher price. I didn’t understand why the sudden up charge for the same shoes in the same size but I was quite upset and dissatisfied by this result. However, I will say that Stock X did still had the lower cost option than the other websites and the shoes did come in premium condition. Just wish I could have bought them for the original price I was told.

Review.Titre: I had chosen PayPal extended pay
Review.Contenu: I had chosen PayPal extended pay. I chose to pay in 4 installments. This appeared on the invoice. Although my debit card was charged the total amount. No explanation was given.

Review.Titre: Awful packaging
Review.Contenu: Shipping was very slow! The packaging was completely destroyed, package was open and item was  falling out of the package. I am sure it was from shipping but it was bad. I haven’t had a chance to check the item, hoping it’s not ripped! I can send a picture if you would like. My name is Jody Cantu

Review.Titre: Missing Old School Receipt
Review.Contenu: Shoes and box were in great condition. However it was missing the old-school receipt that was originally included in this relaunch. Disappointed that it wasn't in the box upon arrival.

Review.Titre: Shoes showed up in a dented box
Review.Contenu: Shoes showed up in a dented box, couple loose threads, excess glue on the toe and a couple of the sewn lines on the top of the left shoe were crooked.

Review.Titre: The delivery was alright
Review.Contenu: The delivery was fine. I didn't like how the box was a bit beat up. Not just that, it took a long time to deliver.

Review.Titre: From purchase to delivery was crazy…
Review.Contenu: From purchase to delivery was crazy long.

Review.Titre: i have never heard of stockx before i…
Review.Contenu: i have never heard of stockx before i bought a pair of nike tech joggers and it’s taking ages for the seller to ship to stockx and the live chat don’t work at all

Review.Titre: Arrival Time
Review.Contenu: When it finally arrived the product was great and my grandson loves the shoes.  However all the extra fees were ridiculous especially how long it took for them to arrive.  I would get a notice that they were coming and get one that they were delayed.  Honestly I don't know if we will purchase from the company again...Their reply is why we will not purchase from this company again...Customer Service is terrible!!!

Review.Titre: Could be better
Review.Contenu: While the shoes themselves are in great condition(read new), the box they came in and the paper in the box was ripped/torn, which definitely reduces the value original packaging would provide for limited edition shoes. Ultimately, they're a gift so it's not world ending, but I was hoping for better.

Review.Titre: I don't like that I can't return my…
Review.Contenu: I don't like that I can't return my purchase. The shoes I ordered are nit what I expected and now I'm stuck with a 120 dollar pair of shoes i don't want. I wish I could return them!

Review.Titre: Good quality if one has time to wait for delivery...
Review.Contenu: I liked the quality of the product, new, as described, the fact that Stockx kept me up to date al the time about the status of my order.I disliked the long delivery time - 20 days it's just to long.

Review.Titre: Buyer beware
Review.Contenu: The shoes were exactly what I ordered. What I didn’t like was the handling fee ($6) and the shipping fee ($14). If I had waited for New Balance to restock the shoe I’d have paid a lot less. Shipping would have been free. The low price of the shoes at StockX was deceiving. And I’m still hoping they aren’t knockoffs. Fingers crossed. Buyer beware.

Review.Titre: I submitted a bid for shoes
Review.Contenu: I submitted a bid for shoes. It took 6 days for the bid to be accepted. I didn't hear anything from stockx for 6 days while waiting for the bid to be accepted or denied. So I bought a different pair of shoes from stockx because I thought my original bid wasnt accepted. Then the bid on the first pair was finally accepted and my card was charged. I wasn't expecting to buy 2 pair of shoes. It was frustrating. Stockx replied to my review by saying to me that stockx works on bids and then accepts or denies the bid. I already knew this.  It shouldn't take 6 days to accept or deny a bid meanwhile leaving the customer in the dark to wait, not knowing what is happening with their bid.

Review.Titre: Box might be in good condition but also might have a slight tear.
Review.Contenu: Shoe seems to be in good condition but the box was torn on the edge and the corner was smashed.

Review.Titre: All good except shipping timeframe
Review.Contenu: The quality of the product and verification process is excellent and the buyer interface is super user friendly. The reason for three stars is the shipping timing. StockX could definitely invest in providing priority shipping labels to sellers and expedite the verification processes. Overall, it took over 2 weeks to receive the product I purchased.

Review.Titre: Size not listed correctly
Review.Contenu: Good general experience, but sizing was not correct. Shoe was listed with American shoe sizes, but the shoe is bigger, UK sizes. So, the listing didn’t match the shoe we got.

Review.Titre: I ordered a sweater and the order about…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a sweater and the order about a week late. But after that everything was great

Review.Titre: Purchasing the shoes was quick and…
Review.Contenu: Purchasing the shoes was quick and easy. Shipping was the hard part. I live in a small town and our physical address are not verified and we get our mail to a P.O. Box. You do not ship to a P.O. Box. I had to ship the shoes to a family member in another town to have them ship them to me. I wish there was a way to put both a physical and aPOBox on the mailing label.

Review.Titre: Disappointed
Review.Contenu: The outer box & the actual shoe box was wet. And what's with the processing fee? I was better off using Nike.com. I'll end up paying the same amount. Sorry but very disappointed

Review.Titre: Not bad if you get a good bid.  3% processing SUCKS!!  Adds up also if large item. My 230 shoes cost 281 after tax processing and shipping!
Review.Contenu: It's  okay the processing Fees are garbage as $15 is already very high 2 ship 1 item!🤔  I only use if the bid I get is low enough to offset the BS fees they add on!  They don't need 3% thats just another TAX on us!  I use waaaaay less now then I did because of the stupid ass BS processing fees and high shipping costs!  Otherwise I have only had 1 issues with a Rolex but all 12 other items came just fine and were authentic. 👍💚

Review.Titre: Great catalogue but terrible purchasing experience
Review.Contenu: Great catalogue. Misleading purchasing process, where bids do not seem to be real. Purchase process where product is shipped to Stockx then to us...a bit weird and not very trustworhty

Review.Titre: The process is too lengthy and the…
Review.Contenu: The process is too lengthy and the variables are many.

Review.Titre: Shoes were delayed due to issues with…
Review.Contenu: Shoes were delayed due to issues with original seller. Second seller send shoes that had a huge amount of creases.

Review.Titre: Dislike the “processing fees” etc,makes…
Review.Contenu: Dislike the “processing fees” etc,makes what was a affordable pair of shoes,outrageously expensive.

Review.Titre: Tracking system could be better
Review.Contenu: Tracking system could be better. Your item can show delivered and it’s with the authenticater and that’s what tracking shows until your package is delivered

Review.Titre: I’m happy I was able and could afford…
Review.Contenu: I’m happy I was able and could afford to purchase. But, I will always have a huge hatred,for having to go through such lengths, and spend almost doubled to purchase something that isn’t available with the original merchant. We have to pay you, the middle man, much more if we really want it. How you’re able to get merchandise that’s sold out, and pay more for it, is shady asf. We are at the mercy of this if we want it bad enough. The bidding and all that, you’re still paying more for it.

Review.Titre: Fast Process/Lackluster Packaging
Review.Contenu: Fast processing and shipment, but lacked in packaging. Ordered a Supreme bogo from the recent drop, and it came delivered in a thin non-padded mailer. I feel like with this being a high value name brand clothing item it should have been at least padded because of the shipping/processing cost. That or preferably in a tamper-sealed box. The thin mailer made the experience feel less valued as well.

Review.Titre: To bid or not to bid…
Review.Contenu: Like the bid process just not how long it takes before u know if your bid is accepted or not! Quicker responses in the bid process, help you to know whether it’s worth just to purchase at list price or not.

Review.Titre: Shoes were exactly as ordered
Review.Contenu: Shoes were exactly as ordered. Came in their shoebox and outer box arrived in good shape. Delivery updates because of shipping was a bit disappointing. The extra "processing fee" when ordered was an unexpected expense making the purchase from the site not the best value.

Review.Titre: This was the second time in a row I…
Review.Contenu: This was the second time in a row I ordered with them had no issues only thing that needs improving is when you first go on the site. I had difficulties trying to get the order in and then was locked out of my Google mail for several hours because something went wrong, but otherwise very pleased with the product, and in the manner in which it arrived before Christmas

Review.Titre: As a first timer I was a bit nervous
Review.Contenu: As a first timer I was a bit nervous.  I like the "quality" check but it unfortunately adds on to the shipping time.   The bidding process was a bit confusing for me but overall a good experience.

Review.Titre: Over communication was annoying but received our shoes earlier than anticipated
Review.Contenu: We received our shoes in a good timeframe. There was some confusion in communication when I wanted to change the address and I received extra emails when I thought it had already been resolved. This wasn’t a huge impact on the service but it was annoying and that’s the reason for the loss of one star in my review.

Review.Titre: Easy to order the item
Review.Contenu: Easy to order the item - but thought we needed to change the address of delivery when we saw it was going to take longer than we thought to deliver. There was no way to get any one’s attention, no one ever responded to any emails or notices o tried to post- no one to help!!!  Good news, order date did change and she is very pleased with her selection ( nice tennis shoes)

Review.Titre: Pricing has gotten better availability…
Review.Contenu: Pricing has gotten better availability as well.  Delivery could be a little faster . But very happy with my purchase and I will continue to purchase in the future.  Also love that you have made PayPal pay later an option.  That really helps the buyer .

Review.Titre: I am mostly pleased with my transaction.  :)
Review.Contenu: I am very pleased with my transaction.  The process was smooth and easy.  My purchase arrived in a timely fashion.  The only thing I'd would suggest is that the OVERALL price be made more attainable at the onset.  This being my first purchase on this site, I was more than a little surprised when my $264 purchase ended up being $325 after the smoke cleared.  I understand that figuring tax will be different for each order depending on where the customer is, but the processing fee and shipping cost should be fairly easy to factor in.   The "total payment" surprise was almost enough to make me change my mind. Had I known when I was initially searching, I believe I would have been okay with it in the beginning.  That's all.

Review.Titre: Smooth transaction overall
Review.Contenu: Smooth transaction; item arrived in new condition as described.  Only 4 stars because the box the shoes came in was damaged, since the original shoe box was shoved into too small of an outer shipping box, but the shoes were fine.  Bought them for my wife to wear so didn’t care about the box, but if these had been collector sneakers it would be a very different story as the box adds value.

Review.Titre: Constant feedback as to the status of…
Review.Contenu: Constant feedback as to the status of the order. One rough experience for my son’s birthday when an order placed was cancelled 2 weeks later leaving no time to turnaround

Review.Titre: Great deal fast shipment
Review.Contenu: Great deal on a pair of shoes that are difficult to find.  Arrived quickly and in perfect condition.  However, the delivery person placed the delivery in our neighbor's workshop.

Review.Titre: It is an interesting experience with…
Review.Contenu: It is an interesting experience with StockX. We received what we ordered in good condition. It did take a little while, and I wondered if we would receive it, but it all worked out.

Review.Titre: Item as described
Review.Contenu: Item as described. Took slightly longer because original seller did not fulfill order. However, StockX found another seller who accepted same price. Great options for finding limited stock or classic items.

Review.Titre: Confusing
Review.Contenu: Different purchasing experience: Thought I was bidding on a pair of shoes, now I’m not sure, found the process confusing.  DHL delivery people wanted me to use their app, I don’t want another app.  Ultimately, DHL delivered the shoes, I have my purchase in hand and all is well, just a lot of extra thinking for a pair of shoes.

Review.Titre: Pretty quick with my pay outs and…
Review.Contenu: Pretty quick with my pay outs and authentication process. Shipping times can be slightly longer if buying sneakers but so far so good.

Review.Titre: It was very easy
Review.Contenu: It was very easy - I could not find this anywhere.  However I believe they are not the PLATFORM slipper but the regular (which is not what I wanted)  So the only downfall is you can't return it

Review.Titre: I think Stock X does a great job
Review.Contenu: I think Stock X does a great job, I just continue to be aggravated by how expensive it is to buy shoes through Stock X. People take advantage of consumers by buying up all of the stock and then I get stuck paying nearly twice the price after, the premium, fees, shipping etc.

Review.Titre: Review
Review.Contenu: Shipping was fast, shoes came in tact, website is designed well, everything is all good BUT some of the extra fees for purchasing are kinda ridiculous in my opinion, I ended up buying shoes being sold like 5$ under retail I believe and ended up paying 15$ over retail entirely made up of extra fees. I mean, I get it processing fees, shipping fees, whatever but like damn.

Review.Titre: The app created two orders when I only…
Review.Contenu: The app created two orders when I only wanted one. However, they were quick to reverse the duplicate order a few days later. Phone support rather than a chat box would have gone a long way to reduce the anxiety while waiting days for acknowledgement that the duplicate would be reversed.

Review.Titre: The item came on the original day they…
Review.Contenu: The item came on the original day they said that it would. I was worried as I didn’t realize it came from overseas and had to clear customs. Best thing ever that it came for Christmas,

Review.Titre: Shoes
Review.Contenu: At first I was reluctant to order from here because I had never use this page, but it was done with no problem, since I found what I was looking for. A Christmas gift for my daughter

Review.Titre: Prompt service, effective communication
Review.Contenu: We were able to source some products through you which were unavailable at multiple vendors elsewhere - very pleased. Only hiccup was a switch of supplier at one stage - with a later delivery date (we would have missed Christmas), without the option to cancel. However this was remedied and the package arrived on time.

Review.Titre: good
Review.Contenu: Checkout was fast and easy only complaint was shipping took quite a while other than that no complaints 👍👍

Review.Titre: Timely and product arrived as…
Review.Contenu: Timely and product arrived as described. FULL cost should be upfront prior to submitting order. Thanks!

Review.Titre: I love how quickly my package arrived
Review.Contenu: I love how quickly my package arrived. The shoes were perfect; a little pricey but I couldn't find then anywhere else.

Review.Titre: It was a intuitive experience
Review.Contenu: It was a intuitive experience, easy to buy and track the order. The only thing I didn't like was that the inside of the shoe  had a red stained, that should be checked in the verification.

Review.Titre: helped me find a product I couldn't find
Review.Contenu: helped me find a product I couldn't find elsewhere, and got it shipped to me in the time span I needed. Great correspondence from order placing straight through to delivery.

Review.Titre: Purchase arrived quickly
Review.Contenu: Purchase arrived quickly. I was worried at first as upon reviewing myPurchase it stated that I didn’t purchase anything. But it turned out ok in the end. Very happy

Review.Titre: First time buyer on stock x
Review.Contenu: While I received the product I ordered, the process was long and expensive, which is why I took a star off. However, I did appreciate all the updates and keeping me informed of the progress.

Review.Titre: Generally it was good that delivery…
Review.Contenu: Generally it was good that delivery arrived. Unfortunately the wrapping of delivery was not so good. Package was damaged from several places. If StockX ask such a high price for shipping and extra service then I as customer would expect to receive something for this service.

Review.Titre: Order took 1 week longer than expected…
Review.Contenu: Order took 1 week longer than expected but it was due to the seller and not StockX. They were fast at getting another seller and received my shoes the following week. Good service, nice shipping tracking system.

Review.Titre: You can’t find great items but watch for fees
Review.Contenu: I was able to get a pair of shoes my boyfriend has wanted for a long time. Unfortunately I felt like there were hidden fees I wasn’t fully aware of until I was checking out

Review.Titre: Everything, with the exception of returns is great
Review.Contenu: After some time trying to contact StockX I was able to return the item but it still needs to be assessed before refund.  Very difficult process but otherwise was good.

Review.Titre: I liked the selection and how easy it…
Review.Contenu: I liked the selection and how easy it is but I really think there needs to be at least a 30 minute window that the customer can cancel or edit their order if they see there’s been a mistake. Stuck with a pair of shoes I do not want because I ordered in wrong sz. Just a hassle to have to try to resell them

Review.Titre: pricy
Review.Contenu: pricey for crocks but was left no alternative to buy them because it's what my son wanted

Review.Titre: I got shoes that were sold out and I…
Review.Contenu: I got shoes that were sold out and I got them at a reasonable price... I just don't like it takes so long to come one pair came before the other and they were order second ... But thank u I love it

Review.Titre: Shoes arrived as expected
Review.Contenu: Shoes arrived in great shape as expected. Delivery status was constantly changing within the app and on the DHL Delivery site. Would be nice to see more accuracy between the app and the delivery service.!

Review.Titre: Candy Corn SB
Review.Contenu: The shoes I ordered are brand new and they arrived quickly. With it being the first time buying from stock x, I was a little skeptical when I placed the order. Stock x kept me updated as to when and where my package was. The shoes are in perfect condition. Thank you! All is well. Of course, as with any processing fees, none of us like to pay them. I understand the reason for them, doesn't mean I have to like to pay them...

Review.Titre: Quick but incorrect box
Review.Contenu: The shipping was fast which is always. Uggs were the correct style and color. However, the box was incorrect devaluing the credit of the authenticity if I were to resell. That’s disappointing coming from a company that is known for their vigorous authentication process.

Review.Titre: The item page shows to many prices…
Review.Contenu: The item page shows to many different prices. Also I could have gotten the wallet for cheaper on their own website…

Review.Titre: The product arrived in a timely fashion…
Review.Contenu: The product arrived in a timely fashion with good updates on delivery.  The shoes are a gift for Christmas to my son as he asked for them - however, it is a surprise and he has not opened them yet so I can not do a honest review on the product!  I hope he loves them!  Currently they are under the tree!

Review.Titre: Process went well shipping took longer…
Review.Contenu: Process went well shipping took longer then expected due to being linked with a seller in Europe.

Review.Titre: Why the delay?
Review.Contenu: I purchased shoes Nov 28th and they weren’t delivered until Dec 15th. I was notified there was a delay without any further explanation.

Review.Titre: Better customer service/ accountability
Review.Contenu: Goat sent me fake Jordan 1 lost and founds.    So that gives you guys (StockX) a one up on them. I’ve yet to get a fake. But quality control on items sent need to be better. If received damaged items from stock x twice now but, I understand that happensAccountability is important.

Review.Titre: The sneakers looked as promised however box did not
Review.Contenu: The sneakers looked as promised, new however the box was pretty worn and ripped slightly. I think it should have been listed as such for this kind of money. It was almost $75 in fees which is ridiculous.

Review.Titre: My first purchase, Great service and delivery times
Review.Contenu: The order arrived in good condition, like new and original. The process was somewhat slow because the first seller did not comply with StockX policies, but I did not have to do anything additional, StockX solved everything and they found me a new seller and for the same price, but affecting the delivery date initially estimated (thats why 4 of 5 stars), affecting the experience a little, in any case they met the new delivery date and arrived on time, I am surprised that the shipments are so fast, from China to Mexico in just 4 days, impressive.

Review.Titre: High prices, hidden costs but great access to products and good service
Review.Contenu: Although prices are high and the additional fees are expensive, and shipping requires you to pay for each item individually (which of course makes the cost of shipping high as well), you can find items that are sold out everywhere else. Review.Titre: StockX are legit and easy to deal with!

I received an email every step of the way, Shoes were sent to StockX for verification, shoes were verified and being sent to me, etc. I was given a tracking #, they arrived on time, and within the window StockX originally provided.  Very painless and stress free process.  I would recommend them and use them again.
